title: On the border of life: glimpses of French biological research
creator_credit: Jean Rostand, Nicole Vedres, Jacqueline Jacoupy and Triangle Productions
brief_description: Opens with brief introductions to biology, and then surveys the work of leading French laboratories. The ground covered includes experiments in artificial parthenogenesis, sex determination, suspended animation and research into the secrets of immortality. Commentary by John Barry.
